projects.name: LANDSLIDE DETECTION USING SATELLITE IMAGES
projects.description: Implemented a system for landslide detection using satellite images, incorporating image processing and machine learning techniques. Developed a working model with HTML, CSS, and Flask to visualize and interact with the landslide detection results.

projects.name: PIC PULSE - ONLINE PICTURE STORER
projects.description: Engineered a secure online image storage application with Python Django and SQL, delivering robust functionality. Designed an intuitive user interface using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, ensuring a seamless experience for efficient image management.

projects.name: URL SHORTENER
projects.description: Developed a custom URL shortener using Django, providing a robust and scalable solution for generating shortened URLs. Leveraged Djangos powerful features to ensure seamless integration and efficient management of URL redirection and analytics.

experiences.description: Developed a basic banking website with CRUD operations as part of an internship project at The Spark Foundation. Enhanced and secured a banking website developed during The Spark Foundation internship using advanced Django skills for optimal functionality.

full_output.name: Ritik Srivastava
achievements_and_awards: Solved over 500+ problems on Leetcode, showcasing proficiency in algorithmic problem-solving.
Ranked 32nd in college on GeeksForGeeks for consistent daily problem solving.
